trans-unit.note: Error message. %1$@ is the folder name, %2$@ is the sync service.

trans-unit.id: Choose sync service…
Choose where in the %@ folder you want to locate the folder '%@':\nYou can also customise the name of the folder in the cloud.
trans-unit.source: Choose where in the %1$@ folder you want to locate the folder '%2$@':\nYou can also customise the name of the folder in the cloud.
trans-unit.note: Message on Set Folder Name and Location dialog. %1$@ is the folder name, %2$@ is the sync service.

trans-unit.id: Donate Now
Folder Name:
trans-unit.note: Prompt for user to choose a custom folder name in the Set Folder Name and Location dialog.

trans-unit.id:
Hello! It's Sebastian here, MacDropAny's 17 year old developer.

I hope you're enjoying having your folders synced with the cloud with MacDropAny.

MacDropAny is a free app, but it has taken a long time and a lot of work to build. If you find it useful, please consider making a donation to help cover the costs of developing, distributing and supporting it.

There is nothing more exciting or encouraging for me than knowing that my apps have been useful and valuable to you. By releasing my apps freely, I hope that my apps will be used by as many people as possible, all around the world. I fully appreciate that not everyone is able to donate, but if you can, please do so to help keep my apps free for everyone.

Thank you,
Sebastian Hallum Clarke
trans-unit.source:
Hello! It's Sebastian here, MacDropAny's 17 year old developer.

I hope you're enjoying having your folders synced with the cloud with MacDropAny.

MacDropAny is a free app, but it has taken a long time and a lot of work to build. If you find it useful, please consider making a donation to help cover the costs of developing, distributing and supporting it.

There is nothing more exciting or encouraging for me than knowing that my apps have been useful and valuable to you. By releasing my apps freely, I hope that my apps will be used by as many people as possible, all around the world. I fully appreciate that not everyone is able to donate, but if you can, please do so to help keep my apps free for everyone.

Thank you,
Sebastian Hallum Clarke

trans-unit.id: MacDropAny Sync History
MacDropAny has failed to sync the folder '%@' with %@ because of the following error:\n\n%@
trans-unit.source: MacDropAny has failed to sync the folder '%1$@' with %2$@ because of the following error:\n\n%3$@
trans-unit.note: Message of Sync Failed window. %1$@ is the folder name, %2$@ is the sync service, %3$@ is the error message.

trans-unit.id: MacDropAny has successfully synced the folder '%@' with %@.
trans-unit.source: MacDropAny has successfully synced the folder '%1$@' with %2$@.
trans-unit.note: Message of Sync Successful window. %1$@ is the folder name, %2$@ is the sync service.

trans-unit.id: MacDropAny: Would you like to donate?
trans-unit.source: MacDropAny: Would you like to donate?

trans-unit.id: Maybe later
No sync service has been selected.
trans-unit.source: No sync service has been selected.

trans-unit.id: No, thanks
Quit MacDropAny
Sync Another Folder
Sync Failed
Sync Successful!
Sync via MacDropAny

trans-unit.id: The folder you are trying to sync is protected. You must enter your password to allow MacDropAny to sync this folder.
